attributes.action: seize previous bonus payments and assets purchased with said previous bonus payments from those employed or previously employed in the financial services sector that are deemed to be retrospectively negligent in their duties by an independent panel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petition is for justice for the UK taxpayer. It is about time that those in the financial sector, that have decimated the economy, jobs, pensions, savings and future prospects of young Britons by their sheer greed are brought to bear and made to answer for their actions and be financially punished as necessary.

An independent panel/comission to be convened to determine culpability.

Their bonuses/assets should be seized for the treasury and they would thus be made aware that purposeful financial negligence to gain a "bonus" is not without retribution.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "seize previous bonus payments and assets purchased with said previous bonus payments from those employed or previously employed in the financial services sector that are deemed to be retrospectively negligent in their duties by an independent panel."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
